qas.question: What is important for a student in education?
What does education increase in a student?
What is intelligence at 53 more closely related to?
What is not important for a student in education?
What does education decrease in a student?
What is intelligence at 53 less related to?
What level of education do those who do not perform well at school go to?

context: <a0_0><b3_0>Intelligence<b3_0/><a0_0/> is an important factor in how the individual responds to education. Those who have higher intelligence tend to perform better at school and go on to <b6_0>higher levels of education<b6_0/>. This effect is also observable in the opposite direction, in that education increases <a1_0><b4_0>measurable intelligence<b4_0/><a1_0/>. Studies have shown that while educational attainment is important in predicting intelligence in later life, intelligence at 53 is more closely correlated to <a2_0><b5_0>intelligence at 8<a2_0/> years old<b5_0/> than to educational attainment.
